title: Yes, I have books to publish
text: But you can read them firstly here and buy a copy later, if you want it. Spread the word.
dores_cronicas: As Dores Cr√¥nicas is a book of chronicles, poetry and prose that were gathered in a single volume and that satirizes in the title the form of art through which it proposes to express itself. Comprising a long period of the author's life, the work is based on perspectives and reports of his own experience, making use of writing in different lines of expression to give voice to the narratives that have accumulated and deduced from social life and their relationships in the midst of to different periods.
